1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-the-like-box-in-the-post-plugin
1.0.description: With this plugin, it will display Facebook The Like Box in a more flexible position in your Wordpress content (post), i.e. top or bottom of the post page. More than that, it also enable to display Facebook The Like Box in selective post using provided Wordpress code template. Facebook The Like Box is a social plugin that enables Facebook Page owners to attract and gain Likes from their own website. The Like Box enables users to: See how many users already like this Page, and which of their friends like it too, Read recent posts from the Page, Like the Page with one click, without needing to visit the Page
